content.question: How do the <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mi>pH</mi></math> and buffer capacity of buffer <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> compare to those of buffer <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi> </math>?

content.answer: Buffer <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">X</mi></math> has the same <math alttext="p H" overflow="scroll"><mi>pH</mi></math> as buffer <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math> and a smaller buffer capacity than buffer <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">Y</mi></math>.
